results.title: Antiarrhythmic effects of simvastatin in canine pulmonary vein sleeve preparations.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: Our data suggest that in addition to its upstream actions to reduce @DISEASE_Atrial_Remodeling @DISEASE_MESH:D064752 @@@atrial structural remodeling@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ exerts a direct antiarrhythmic effect by suppressing triggers responsible for the genesis of @<m>DISEASE_Atrial_Fibrillation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001281 @@@atrial fibrillation@@@.

citations.NLM: Sicouri S, Gianetti B, Zygmunt AC, Cordeiro JM, Antzelevitch C. Antiarrhythmic effects of simvastatin in canine pulmonary vein sleeve preparations. J Am Coll Cardiol. 2011 Feb 22;57(8):986-93. PMID: 21329846
